name: Energy Invasion
description: Energy Invasion - an arcade game inspired by the classic Breakout. Unlike the original game, your ball does not break blocks on its own, but can launch missiles in a chosen direction.
minimum_requirements: OS: XP Processor: 2.4 Ghz Dual Core CPU Memory: 1024 MB RAM Graphics: 512MB Dedicated Memory DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 500 MB available space Sound Card: DirectX® Compatible Additional Notes: UI optimized for 16:9 aspect ratio
recommended_requirements: OS: 10 Processor: 3.0 Ghz Quad Core CPU or faster Memory: 1024 MB RAM Graphics: 512MB Dedicated Memory DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 500 MB available space Sound Card: DirectX® Compatible Additional Notes: UI optimized for 16:9 aspect ratio
